Macro - boolean
Macros
ora_adr

update value at adr by ORing the content with val

Params
adr

address to update

val

value to OR with adr

and_adr

update value at adr by ANDing the content with val

Params
adr

address to update

val

value to AND with adr

eor_adr

update value at adr by XORing the content with val

Params
adr

address to update

val

value to XOR with adr

shift

Do n Shift.  More precisely, Do the instruction ins n times.

Params
ins

the shift instruction to use

n

the number of time to shift
